text: The 1958 Oregon Webfoots football team represented the University of Oregon in the Pacific Coast Conference (PCC) during the 1958 NCAA University Division football season. In their eighth season under head coach Len Casanova, the Webfoots compiled a 4–6 record (4–4 against PCC opponents), finished in fifth place in the PCC, and outscored their opponents, 93 to 50. The team played its home games at Hayward Field in Eugene, Oregon. The team's statistical leaders included Dave Grosz with 468 passing yards and Willie West with 470 rushing yards and 140 receiving yards. ==Schedule== ==References== Oregon Category:Oregon Ducks football seasons Oregon Ducks football
title: 1958 Oregon Webfoots football team
